response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth in your business or personal endeavors. Our product is not just any item; it is a game-changer, designed to revolutionize the way you operate and achieve your goals.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $1,200,000 for this exclusive offering. This price reflects our commitment to making such a transformative tool accessible to forward-thinking individuals like yourself while ensuring a fair return on our investment.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any additional information you require to make an informed decision. We believe in building long-term relationships and are confident that our product will exceed your expectations.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
